body: An attempt at translating the setup/premise (part 4): FAT STUDENT: "Hmmm, I see. I get it, teacher. I won't quit the club activities... if you let me have sex with you. Do you agree to my terms? These club activities make it difficult for me to concentrate, and I want to graduate from being a virgin! It's like I'm still a child, I'm tired of being left out, is it because I'm ugly?! What I hate even more is being looked down upon, so I thought I'd graduate from my virginity. I want to have sex with a woman, but how can I do it? However, if the teacher has sex with me, then I can maybe be motivated to continue in the club, right?" // FMC: "What are you saying? I don't think you can ask that kind of thing." // FAT STUDENT: "Can't I? You definitely can do it if you can handle it. So, what is it teacher? // FMC: "Absolutely not! How could you ask your teacher to do that kind of thing?" // FAT STUDENT: "As usual, you're being hard headed. If you don't like my terms, then I quit."

An attempt at translating the setup/premise (part 3): FAT STUDENT: "It's getting boring. At first, when I was improving my abilities, it was fun, but not I think it's about time I'm over it." // FMC: "Is that so? But Yamamoto, you can still continue to improve and get better. This tournament is a big deal, even for professionals." // FAT STUDENT: "Hahaha, I suppose. But at this point, I'm tired of the game, so continuing to play it just sucks, doesn't it? Even if I continue, the whole fuss around it is just crap. I'm just not interested in it anymore, it's just something to do, that's why. Even if I do it, I'm only praised by the elderly. High school students still bully me, so why continue doing it?" // FMC'S THOUGHTS: I was disappointed. My favorite game was being ridiculed like that. And he's making a fool out of me and the game. I guess that's just how it is. // FMC: "Please Yamamoto-kun. I'm asking you not to quit. If you don't feel like coming to practice, you don't have to."

An attempt at translating the setup/premise (part 2): PRINCIPAL: "Nothing, just that I wanted to give this to the teacher. It's for Yamamoto from the merchant association. The tournament is tiring, so proper supplementation will make things easier. Things are going to get difficult as the tournament nears. Even at the autumn prefectural convention, we had a strong showing. This year, I'm enthusiastic that we are sure to win. The reputation of the school depends on him, so I wanted to inform you bluntly, Inagawa Sensei!" // FMC: "Sigh, I'll try to talk to him again." // FAT STUDENT: "Can you make this quick? I have something to do after this." // FMC: "Sorry, I'll end this quickly. I want you to tell me plainly why do you want to quit the club? Is the practice upsetting you? Or are the people around you annoying you?" // FAT STUDENT: "Hehe, there is no big or major reason for it. It's simple: I'm just tired of it." // FMC: "Eh?"

An attempt at translating the setup/premise (part 1): FMC: "What do you mean you want to quit the club? Wait a minute. Why don't you want to participate in this tournament?!" // FAT STUDENT: "It's fine, I don't care anymore. Well, that's it." // FMC: "Wait!" // FMC'S THOUGHTS: It's one month until the local qualifying round for the national tournament when Yamamoto-kun suddenly wanted to quit. It's normal because participation is voluntary for the students, however, in the case of Yamamoto-kun, I don't want him to quit. Last year, though he was a grade-school student, he was runner-up at the national competition. For the next two months, that feat caused great excitement, not to mention local officials praised him for being a genius boy. And this year, even though he was winning, the expectations were piling up on him. // PRINCIPAL: "Excuse me." // FMC: "Sensei Principal! What's wrong?"
Live action JAV adaptation code: URE-075; FMC played by JAV actress Rena Kodama
